article:
A newspaper reporter's job can be very interesting. He meets all kinds of people and lives quite  a busy  life. He is on the rush for a newspaper all the time, then after several years he  may  get a desk job,and life becomes a bit more settled.
In a day he may have to interview the prime minister of a foreign country, and the next day he may be writing  _  a football match. Sometimes he may be so  _  that he has hardly any time to sleep. And  _  other times he may go on for days  looking  out for news,and yet return  _  empty hands.
In the beginning,a reporter has to  _  a very wide field. After the early years, he becomes more specialized  in his work.  _  example,he may finally  be asked  to write only on politics or sports. Some newspapers have book reviews. Their job is  _  . They read the  _  books and then write reviews on the ones they like. Then there are those  _  write on films. So they get to see them even  _  they are shown in the cinema.  How  lucky, you would say!
A newspaper reporter's job can also be very  _  A number of them have died rushing from one place to another and if there is a flood or a riot they may get  hurt  or even be killed. Three years ago there was a reporter  _  camera was broken by a group of men,  _  they were angry with him for taking their pictures. Dangerous or not, one thing is certain,and that is, their job is never  _  .
